lead_paragraph: The Denver Nuggets will suspend forward Carmelo Anthony for the first two games of the 2008-9 season because of his arrest on suspicion of driving under the influence of alcohol. Anthony was arrested on April 14 and is scheduled to appear in court in Denver on Tuesday. The suspension came the day Anthony was named to the United States men’s basketball team for the Beijing Games.
